doc: Martin Freeman https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Martin_Freeman 1 Martin John Christopher Freeman (born 8 September 1971) is an English actor and comedian, who became known for portraying Tim Canterbury in the original UK version of sitcom mockumentary The Office, Dr. John Watson in the British crime drama Sherlock, Bilbo Baggins in Peter Jackson's The Hobbit film trilogy, and Lester Nygaard in the dark comedy-crime drama TV series Fargo. His other notable film roles include the romantic comedy Love Actually (2003), the comic science fiction film The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy (2005), the semi-improvised comedy Nativity! (2009), the comedic Three Flavours Cornetto trilogy, most prominently in the sci-fi comedy The World's End (2013), and his portrayal of Everett K. Ross in the Marvel films Captain America: Civil War (2016) and Black Panther (2018). Among other accolades, he has won an Emmy Award, BAFTA Award and an Empire Award, with nominations including two other Emmy Awards, two other BAFTA Awards, a Saturn Award, and a Golden Globe Award. Martin_John_Christopher_Freeman ( born 8_September_1971 ) is an_English_actor_and_comedian , who became_known for portraying Tim_Canterbury in the_original_UK_version of sitcom mockumentary The_Office , Dr._John_Watson in the_British_crime_drama_Sherlock , Bilbo_Baggins in Peter_Jackson 's_The_Hobbit_film_trilogy , and Lester_Nygaard in the_dark_comedy-crime_drama_TV_series_Fargo . His_other_notable_film_roles include the_romantic_comedy_Love_Actually_(_2003_) , the_comic_science_fiction_film The_Hitchhiker 's_Guide to the_Galaxy_(_2005_) , the_semi-improvised_comedy_Nativity ! (_2009_) , the_comedic_Three_Flavours_Cornetto_trilogy , most_prominently in the_sci-fi_comedy The_World 's_End_(_2013_) , and his_portrayal of Everett_K._Ross in the_Marvel_films_Captain_America : Civil_War_(_2016_)_and_Black_Panther_(_2018_) . Among other_accolades , he has_won an_Emmy_Award , BAFTA_Award and an_Empire_Award , with nominations including two_other_Emmy_Awards , two_other_BAFTA_Awards , a_Saturn_Award , and a_Golden_Globe_Award . born 8 September 1971 ) is an English actor and comedian , who became known for portraying {PERSON[Tim_Canterbury]} in the original {LOCATION[UK]} version of sitcom mockumentary The Office , Dr. {PERSON[John_Watson]} in the British crime drama {PERSON[Sherlock]} , {PERSON[Bilbo_Baggins]} in {PERSON[Peter_Jackson]} 's The Hobbit film trilogy , and {PERSON[Lester_Nygaard]} in the dark comedy-crime drama TV series Fargo . His other notable film roles include the romantic comedy Love Actually ( 2003 ) , the comic science fiction film The Hitchhiker 's Guide to the Galaxy ( 2005 ) , the semi-improvised comedy Nativity ! ( 2009 ) , the comedic Three Flavours Cornetto trilogy , most prominently in the sci-fi comedy The World 's End ( 2013 ) , and his portrayal of {PERSON[Everett_K._Ross]} in the Marvel films Captain America : Civil War ( 2016 ) and Black Panther ( 2018 ) . Among other accolades , he has won an Emmy Award , BAFTA Award and an Empire Award , with nominations including two other Emmy Awards , two other BAFTA Awards , a Saturn Award , and a Golden Globe Award . {PERSON[Martin_John_Christopher_Freeman]} ( born 8 September 1971 ) is an {MISC[English]} actor and comedian , who became known for portraying {PERSON[Tim_Canterbury]} in the original {LOCATION[UK]} version of sitcom mockumentary The {ORGANIZATION[Office]} , Dr. {PERSON[John_Watson]} in the {MISC[British]} crime drama {PERSON[Sherlock]} , {PERSON[Bilbo_Baggins]} in {PERSON[Peter_Jackson]} 's {LOCATION[The_Hobbit]} film trilogy , and {PERSON[Lester_Nygaard]} in the dark comedy-crime drama TV series Fargo . His other notable film roles include the romantic comedy {ORGANIZATION[Love_Actually]} ( 2003 ) , the comic science fiction film The Hitchhiker 's Guide to the {MISC[Galaxy]} ( 2005 ) , the semi-improvised comedy {ORGANIZATION[Nativity]} ! ( 2009 ) , the comedic Three {PERSON[Flavours_Cornetto]} trilogy , most prominently in the sci-fi comedy The {MISC[World_'s_End]} ( 2013 ) , and his portrayal of {PERSON[Everett_K._Ross]} in the {LOCATION[Marvel]} films {LOCATION[Captain_America]} : {MISC[Civil_War]} ( 2016 ) and {PERSON[Black_Panther]} ( 2018 ) . Among other accolades , he has won an {MISC[Emmy_Award]} , {ORGANIZATION[BAFTA_Award]} and an {MISC[Empire_Award]} , with nominations including two other {ORGANIZATION[Emmy_Awards]} , two other {MISC[BAFTA_Awards]} , a {ORGANIZATION[Saturn_Award]} , and a {ORGANIZATION[Golden_Globe_Award]} . Martin {PERSON[John_Christopher_Freeman]} ( born 8 {DATE[September_1971]} ) is an English actor and comedian , who became known for portraying {ORGANIZATION[Tim_Canterbury]} in the original UK version of sitcom mockumentary The Office , Dr. {PERSON[John_Watson]} in the British crime drama {PERSON[Sherlock]} , {PERSON[Bilbo_Baggins]} in {PERSON[Peter_Jackson]} 's The Hobbit film trilogy , and {PERSON[Lester_Nygaard]} in the dark comedy-crime drama TV series Fargo . His other notable film roles include the romantic comedy Love Actually ( 2003 ) , the comic science fiction film The Hitchhiker 's Guide to the Galaxy ( {DATE[2005]} ) , the semi-improvised comedy Nativity ! ( {DATE[2009]} ) , the comedic Three Flavours Cornetto trilogy , most prominently in the sci-fi comedy The World 's End ( 2013 ) , and his portrayal of {PERSON[Everett_K._Ross]} in the Marvel films Captain America : Civil War ( {DATE[2016]} ) and Black Panther ( 2018 ) . Among other accolades , he has won an Emmy Award , {ORGANIZATION[BAFTA_Award]} and an Empire Award , with nominations including two other Emmy Awards , two other BAFTA Awards , a {ORGANIZATION[Saturn_Award]} , and a {ORGANIZATION[Golden_Globe_Award]} .
